meanings.definition: A thing that causes someone to remember something.
meanings.sent1: The sticky note on my desk served as a reminder to buy milk on the way home.
meanings.sent2: She set an alarm on her phone as a reminder to take her medicine.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot became a funny reminder to feed the cat every day.
meanings.sent4: The old photo album was a nostalgic reminder of the good times we had.
meanings.sent5: The ringing of the church bells was a constant reminder of the passage of time.

meanings.definition: A note or message that serves to remind someone of something.
meanings.sent1: I left a reminder on the fridge for my roommate to pay the rent.
meanings.sent2: The email reminder about the meeting helped everyone prepare on time.
meanings.sent3: The reminder on his phone buzzed every hour to drink water, making him laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a warm reminder in the cold winter days.
meanings.sent5: The handwritten reminder on the mirror was impossible to miss in the morning rush.
